name: MEAR
description:
A game made in 3 days for the Global Game Jam at the Amber Waves of Games site.

The prompt: Lost and Found

Created by: Maranara, Someone Somewhere, Alecpizz,  Quack, and L4rs

It's really dark, and you need to kill all the monsters. Your flashlight is powered by your screams.

ATTENTION: This uses your microphone. Make sure you have your primary microphone set to the Default Device before you play.
